Constantly lost in the sea of tabs?

Switching projects or topics overwhelms you?

SpaceVibe is your perfect solution!


✴️ Workspaces - Enable Stress-Free Multitasking

Create workspaces for different tasks, projects, or topics.

Group related tabs and bookmarks within each workspace.

Switch workspaces and sync tabs instantly. 

Eliminate distractions, maximize your productivity.

All the features you want, in a fast, local app.


✴️ Local-First - Elegant Apps Run Locally

Remote web apps can be unreliable.

Their performance depends on the internet.

SpaceVibe runs on your machine.

Free your workflow from distant servers.

Access your data even when offline.

Manage your workspaces anytime, anywhere, instantly.


✴️ Total Data Control & Privacy - Essential to All of Us

Why create accounts for every minor app?

Why leave your data to random servers?

SpaceVibe requires no account setup.

No tracking, no data collection, and most importantly - no ads.

Keep your data local, no more vendor lock-in.


✴️ Data Sync - The Natural Solution

How do you sync without creating an account?

The answer is natural: Store your workspaces in your browser bookmarks.

Access your workflow anywhere using browser sync.

Easily backup or transfer your data by exporting bookmarks.

Excitingly, future updates will offer syncing with your preferred third-party services.


✴️ Your Feedback Matters

Your support makes long-term improvements possible.

Share your experience – report issues, suggest features on my Discord server: https://discord.gg/zPRGEVNAPB

Special offer for early supporters - a lifetime license for $20: https://www.patreon.com/zoekai/shop
